channel.title: Running my server
channel.description:
when i run my server i click compiler.bat close the window then runserver and minimize the server but they have error's on them and i cant get on my testscape server, i have download JDk6u1.
What should i do?
Error 1 (compiler) these are the error's 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Error 2 (runserver) Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Running my server
item.dc:creator: @rw_master rw master
item.description:
@rw_master wrote:

when i run my server i click compiler.bat close the window then runserver and minimize the server but they have error’s on them and i cant get on my testscape server, i have download JDk6u1.

What should i do?

Error 1 (compiler)
these are the error’s
‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

Error 2 (runserver)
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
